mapper.select: select nvl(sum(price*amount),0) money from cart c, product p where userid=#{userid} and p.product_id = c.product_id
mapper.insert: insert into cart(cart_id, userid, product_id, amount) values(cart_seq.nextval,#{userid},#{product_id},#{amount})
mapper.select: select product_name, sum(price*amount) money from cart c, product p where c.product_id = p.product_id group by product_name order by product_name
